root.name: Combat Tanks
root.description: OverviewCombat Tanks was developed by two-man team Michael Morrison and Randy Weems. Inspired by Combat for the Atari 2600, their goal was to design an expanded version for the Window platform. Distributed as shareware via their company Red Herring Software, the game eventually sold 30,000 copies through the aid of a larger publisher.NotesThe full version of the game may now be downloaded for free from the developer's website.
